attributes.action: ensure MP's  accused of false claims for  tax free 'expenses' face full HMRC investigation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MP's who are being accused of submitting false expenses claims and in many cases have admitted doing so and repaid some monies, should face urgent investigation by the Inland Revenue and be treated in exactly the same way as the average person would be.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
